text: authors | body | category | created_at | headline | id | location | organizations | published_date | references | related_ids | severity | summary | tags | updated_at id: news_009 | headline: OpenAI launches $50M 'People-First AI Fund' for nonprofits | summary: OpenAI announces a $50 million fund to support nonprofits focused on AI literacy, equitable access and community-led AI projects. | body: On September 8, 2025 OpenAI announced the People-First AI Fund, committing $50 million to grants, technical resources and partnerships with U.S. nonprofit organizations working on AI literacy, economic opportunity and community innovation. OpenAI framed the fund as part of a broader response to public concerns about concentrated platform power and as an implementation of recommendations from independent advisory bodies. | published_date: 2025-09-08T00:00:00Z | authors: ['OpenAI communications', 'press coverage'] | organizations: ['OpenAI', 'nonprofit community'] | tags: ['funding', 'openai', 'nonprofit', 'community'] | category: social | severity: info | location: United States | related_ids: [] | references: [{'name': 'OpenAI fund announcement', 'url': ''}] | created_at: 2025-09-10T06:30:00Z | updated_at: 2025-09-10T06:30:00Z
